<!-- Code generated from the comments of the Config struct in datasource/amazon/secretsmanager/secret/data.go; DO NOT EDIT MANUALLY -->

- `arn` (string) - The complete Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the secret whose details you want to retrieve

- `name` (string) - The name of the secret whose details you want to retrieve.
  Specify either an `arn` or a `name`, both should not be set together.
